name: Hot Hands
description:
Hot Hands is a new kind of card game where both players play simultaneously!

Max Kaarla: Lead, client side server code, special effects
Joa Lampela: AWS - server code
Jarno Tiainen: Sounds, UI
Kerttu Kautto: code, tutorial
Julia Hautanen: 3D/2D models, trailer
Kaj Kaarla: 2D  card art
Roy Kaarla: Music
